reviews.review:
a very good game, definitely more fun to play survivor more often than not but its super satisfying actually beating good survivors and getting to rank 1 for the first time. 9/10 game 

-sincerely, a no mither self care gamer

This is an amazing, fun, and addictive game. I have been playing this game for about 3 years now, I played on console originally until I got a PC. This game is unique and has good core mechanics. Although it can be  a liltle frustrating that is part of what makes it fun. The dev team is amazing and listens to its community, they frequently release DLC to keep the game exciting and there are customization options for your characters that you can earn by just playing the game. This is a must play for any horror fanatic and its very fun to play with your friends!

Killer: Fun
Survivor: Increasingly more fun per friend you play with

I have played for 700+ hours and all I have come to realise with this game is how the devs don't care about hackers/cheaters they review a survey about the game and only read and pay attention to positive comments but all the time I have played 90% of it you are getting tunneled or camped then you have some people being very toxic to you for instance I played as Nea and got placed on first hook no one came to rescue me for the simple reason I was playing as Nea if the killer don't kill you then your fellow survivors will as there are some people who help the killer by revealing your location by emote of pointing, shining a flashlight at you or rushing movements alerting the killer to you so I strongly advise against getting this game save your money for a better game or only play with friends never play solo.
喜欢这种类型的游戏还很上手
super gierka . Instaluj albo Dwight wyjdzie z szafki i cie zje

You will never know what goes through the killers head. Are they trying to kill you? Are they trying to let you escape? Do killers even feel pity? Guess we will never know
Its great i recommend it and at all circumstances do the turtorial

Very fun game but takes time to learn and be able to not get killed constantly, even better with friends. (Otzdarva is a good person to watch if you want to learn more about how to play the game, the tutorial is.... ok-ish) One major con to the game tho is the player base, it is quite often that you will get killers that play like scum bags and the game does little to nothing to actually punish, let alone prevent players from doing such things, the past 20 or so game as of the review (and much more) have all had people that will just sit infront of you while hooked, preventing your from playing the game, and generally when that happens your team might become disorganised due to trying to save you then they might all die, but even if they dont and they do gens and the gate gets opened, by that time you are already dead and the killer is going to the next person to camp so only half your team makes it out, giving the killer a bunch of blood points and a rank up and leaving whoever got camped first a measely 500 bloodpoints and a de-rank, if the game were to fix these issues then if would be almost perfect.


TL:DR game is good, better with friends, but has major issues with the community and how a person might play that effectively stops you from being able to play the game yourself. (that last part is literal)

This game is perfectly balanced, both sides are absolutely fair and there is no toxicity whatsoever! Every endgame chat is full of smiles and laughs!!!! Don't forget to thank your local killer for the fair and balanced game!!!!
